messages.content:
calculator that lets you input any number and multiply it by 60 by clicking a mul60 button
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

<audio controls src="/media/1757687907_gpt-4o-mini-audio-preview-2024-12-17%2Bcalculator_that_lets_you_input_any_number_and_multiply_it_by_60_f0792428ad8dabea.mp3"></audio>

Here is a simple HTML file with embedded CSS and JavaScript that meets your requirements for a calculator which multiplies any input number by 60 when you click a button:
